dataTemplate.name: BCO_ADJUSTMENT_CHARGES
dataTemplate.description: BCO Adjustment Charges between Sail Dates

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT a.cat_no, sref1.shipment_refnum_value loc, sref2.shipment_refnum_value booking_no, a.shipment_xid shipment_no, a.tag_3 container_no, oob.order_base_xid contract_no, loc1.location_name customer_name, loc2.location_xid origin, loc3.location_xid destination, cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value cut_date, TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') sail_date, obrem.remark_text last_ship_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(a.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr') - TO_DATE(obrem.remark_text,'YYYY-MM-DD')) days_late, a.adjust_desc adjust_description, a.adjust_cat adjust_category, a.adjust_amt adjust_amount FROM (SELECT 1 cat_no, s.shipment_gid, s.shipment_xid, s.source_location_gid, s.dest_location_gid, s.sail_date, ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ssu.tag_3, ssuref1.refnum_value adjust_cat, ssuref2.refnum_value adjust_desc, ssuref3.refnum_value adjust_amt FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssul.order_release_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.ADJUSTMENT_CATEGORY_1' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref2.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_ADJUSTMENT 1' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref3 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref3.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref3.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_ADJUSTMENT 1 VALUE' WHERE s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND (TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) UNION SELECT 2 cat_no, s.shipment_gid, s.shipment_xid, s.source_location_gid, s.dest_location_gid, s.sail_date, ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ssu.tag_3, ssuref1.refnum_value adjust_cat, ssuref2.refnum_value adjust_desc, ssuref3.refnum_value adjust_amt FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssul.order_release_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.ADJUSTMENT_CATEGORY_2' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref2.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_ADJUSTMENT 2' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref3 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref3.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref3.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_ADJUSTMENT 2 VALUE' WHERE s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND (TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) UNION SELECT 3 cat_no, s.shipment_gid, s.shipment_xid, s.source_location_gid, s.dest_location_gid, s.sail_date, ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ssu.tag_3, ssuref1.refnum_value adjust_cat, ssuref2.refnum_value adjust_desc, ssuref3.refnum_value adjust_amt FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssul.order_release_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.ADJUSTMENT_CATEGORY_3' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref2.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_ADJUSTMENT 3' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref3 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref3.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref3.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_ADJUSTMENT 3 VALUE' WHERE s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND (TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) UNION SELECT 4 cat_no, s.shipment_gid, s.shipment_xid, s.source_location_gid, s.dest_location_gid, s.sail_date, ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ssu.tag_3, ssuref1.refnum_value adjust_cat, ssuref2.refnum_value adjust_desc, ssuref3.refnum_value adjust_amt FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssul.order_release_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.ADJUSTMENT_CATEGORY_4' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref2.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_ADJUSTMENT 4' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref3 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref3.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref3.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_ADJUSTMENT 4 VALUE' WHERE s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND (TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) UNION SELECT 5 cat_no, s.shipment_gid, s.shipment_xid, s.source_location_gid, s.dest_location_gid, s.sail_date, ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ssu.tag_3, ssuref1.refnum_value adjust_cat, ssuref2.refnum_value adjust_desc, ssuref3.refnum_value adjust_amt FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssul.order_release_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.ADJUSTMENT_CATEGORY_5' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref2.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_ADJUSTMENT 5' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref3 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref3.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref3.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_ADJUSTMENT 5 VALUE' WHERE s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND (TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) a LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_base vsob ON a.shipment_gid = vsob.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON vsob.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obrem ON vsob.order_base_gid = obrem.order_base_gid AND obrem.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_LAST SHIP DATE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON a.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON a.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || sref2.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_START RAMP CUTOFF TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON a.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON a.source_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc3 ON a.dest_location_gid = loc3.location_gid ORDER BY a.sail_date DESC, a.tag_3, a.cat_no
